explanation: [0-0] A man stands in a room, wearing a green kurta, white pants, and glasses. He smiles and leans against a door. The room has wooden flooring and white walls. The text "When you marry your GIRLFRIEND" appears on the screen.

[0-4] Then the text "First night be like" appears. The man turns and walks towards the camera. The scene cuts to a bedroom with a bed covered in white sheets and scattered with red rose petals. A plant sits on the nightstand. A woman sits on the bed, covered with a red sari. The man approaches her, smiling. He lifts her veil, revealing her smile. She wears a red top and blue denim shorts, holding a bottle of beer.
